description:
Hayato meets Otori Naru, a young girl searching the streets of Yanagihara for her bicycle at night, and accepts the job. She requests he find her stolen red bicycle. On his way home from receiving a job from editor Yoneda, Shusuke runs into author Tamaizumi Hiyoko. However, Shusuke confuses Hiyoko with another author and makes mistake after mistake. He regains his composure and heads to the mixer at
Alexander, but...! Takashi has another peaceful day. He greets his friends, performs his student council duties and chats with his girlfriend Watarai Asuka. He
sees a peaceful world through his eyes...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Suki na Doubutsu wa Pegasus Desu
The Animal I Like Is the Pegasus
好きな動物はペガサスです
